To install the complete package, please execute the script installSDK32.sh as root


- The default installation folder is /opt/kinova

- At the root of the package, you will find the SDK.png icon file. It can be used for launchers and shortcuts.

- Once installed, to modify the installation, you can run 'sudo maintenancetool' in the installed folder.



If you encounter any problems, please contact support@kinovarobotics.com
